    • loginWithUserNameAndPassword

      public boolean loginWithUserNameAndPassword(String userName, String password) throws UserNotFoundException, InvalidPasswordException
      Attempts to log in with the specified username and password. If the login is unsuccessful, it will throw an Exception with the reason for the login failure.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException
      InvalidPasswordException
